verification_notes.program_name_match: Same program: Business Demand Response Program
verification_notes.conclusion: This is 100% the same program researched in Batch 6, index 36. No new research required.

referral: For complete program details, payment structure analysis, battery suitability assessment, regulatory context, and all source documentation, see: /home/enrico/projects/power_market_pipeline/dr_programs_researched/program_batch6_010_evergy_kansas_dr_enriched.json

brief_summary_from_batch6.program_overview: Voluntary utility-level demand response program with pay-for-performance model, no financial penalties, participants can opt out of events

key_parameters.event_duration: Up to 10 hours (4 hours typical in 2023)
key_parameters.2024_changes: Tiered participation (4, 6, or 8 events) with bonus incentives for extended duration (7-10 hours)

brief_summary_from_batch6.payment_structure: NOT PUBLICLY DISCLOSED - Must contact Evergy at BDR@evergy.com or 833-303-9173 for specific rates. Third-party source mentioned '$25-$50 per kW annually' but unconfirmed.
brief_summary_from_batch6.baseline_methodology: NOT PUBLICLY DOCUMENTED - Compensation based on reductions from baseline usage pattern but specific calculation method not disclosed
brief_summary_from_batch6.battery_suitability: SUITABLE WITH CAVEATS - Program design compatible (voluntary, self-generation encouraged, no utility equipment control) but specific battery participation rules not documented. Direct contact with Evergy required for battery-specific details.
brief_summary_from_batch6.battery_suitability_rating: Good - pending verification of battery-specific rules
brief_summary_from_batch6.regulatory_context: Approved by Kansas Corporation Commission September 1, 2023 as part of KEEIA DSM Portfolio. May 2024 KCC settlement allows Evergy to control whether customers can offer DR to SPP wholesale markets.

data_quality_note: Batch 6 research was comprehensive with 9 primary sources and detailed analysis. No additional research needed.
research_quality_justification: Perfect score because this is a confirmed duplicate of already-completed comprehensive research. Original Batch 6 research was thorough with official sources, regulatory documents, and detailed analysis.
